## Method and Materials {#b-method-and-materials}

### Math

A matrix:

$$
\det\begin{vmatrix}
c_0 & c_1 & c_2 & \ldots & c_n\\
c_1 & c_2 & c_3 & \ldots & c_{n+1}\\
c_2 & c_3 & c_4 & \ldots & c_{n+2} \\
\vdots & \vdots & \vdots & \vdots &  \vdots \\
c_n & c_{n+1} & c_{n+2} & \ldots & c_{2n} \\
\end{vmatrix} < 0
$$
